div.p: Curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xviiio die Junii anno Domini et cetera lxxiiijo

The quhilk day Johne of ruthirfurd comperit before the aldirman and baillies of
this burgh eftir as he was warnyt be the offisaris / and in presence of thaim
and vthiris of the consel of the said burgh be his forspekar Androw scherar
he perofferit him and his party til vndirly the declaracione and determinacio
ne of law of the strublance and scaith done til y Duncan of sanquhar of
murcroft and his party . sayand that sen the strublance and scaith was done
he was als' wilfull til amend til the party at the sicht and ordinance
of thaim . and thare frendis than beand present as he and his party had for
fautit / and desirit til haf had a knaulage furthwith tharapon' before
his juge ordinar And than the said Duncan of sanquhar' avisit be his forspekar John'
of ogston sayand that thom of hedetoune quhilk was hurt be the
said Johne and his party in the tym of the said strublance doing is lyand
seik and in perel of dede / and vnto the tym that it war knavin quhethir
the said thomas liffit or deid of the said hurting he desirit til contineu
the said actione betuix the saidis partijs that it mycht haf a determinacione
all togiddir and at anys

And the saidis aldirman and baillies tharapon avisit has tayn law borow
is of baith the partijs til compere before thame quhat tym that thai be
warnit on xv dais to the quhilk baith the partijs consentit And
Duncan of sanquhar has fundin Androw rede of badfothell' law borch
for him and his partie and Johne of ruthirfurd has fundin Alexander men
yes law borch for him and his partie that ilkane of thaim salbe vndis
trublit of vthiris vthirwais than the cours of common law wil

Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxo die mensis et annj prescriptorum quo die subscripti electi
sunt in assisam

Johannes mar alexander meignes Ricardus Vaus de many Duncanus sanquhar'
de murcroft Ricardus de Kyntor andreas scherar thomas fif Dauid symson
Willelmus vocat thomas prat gilbertus de camera Willelmus malisson
thomas malisson thomas alanson Johannes stewart

The same day the assise has decretit and deliuerit that Wil coupar aw and
is haldin to seel Donald gilfelanys chartir of the land that the said
Donald now inhabitis eftir the tenour of the same chartir producit and
schavin to the assise before writin

Qui iurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes crukschank frater margarete crukschank
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis
de vna terra sine tenemento iacente in vico inferiori ecclesie parrochiali beati nicholai
dicti burgi de Aberdene inter terram Nicholai mason ex parte orientali ex parte
vna et terram Donaldi sclatar ex occidentali parte et communem viam regiam vsque boream
et de alia terra iacente in dicto vico inferiori inter terram Dauid symson ex
parte boreali ex parte vna et venellam regiam ex parte australi et communem viam regiam
qua itur ad ecclesiam parochialem predictam eiusdem burgi ex parte orientali Et quod dicta margareta est
legitima et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Johannis fratris sui de dictis terris cum pertinenciis / et est
legitime etatis Et quod dicte terre cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum viginti solidos et tantum
valuerunt tempore pacis . Et tenentur de domino nostro rege in libero burgagio Et quod
nunc existunt in manibus domini nostri Regis . a tempore obitus dicti quondam Johannis quj obiit
per quarterium annj vltimi elapsis uel ea circa in defectu vere heredis Jus suum medio tempore
non prosequentis Datum et cetera

Curia ballivorum legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xxvijo die Junij anno
Domini et cetera lxxiiijo . quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem comparens coram ballivis in Judicio Jacobus de Kyntor manucepit probare
hodie ad octo tanquam peremptorie coram dictis ballivis hora causarum quod actio prosecucionis
eiusdem Jacobi per matheum cowpar de iniusta detencione vnius barelle salmonum
mensure hamburgensis vna cum xxvij s' vsualis monete et cetera fuit posita
et summissa cum consensu ipsius mathei et dicti Jacobi ad determinacionem certorum arbi
trorum desuper per dictas partes concordatas post confectionem vltimi actionis penes huiusmodi causam et cetera

Item eodem die Duncanus de byrs coram ballivis in curia obligatur fideliter ad comparendum
coram eis hodie ad octo tanquam in termino peremptorio ad respondendum plegio per Johannem sympson
scissorem super ipsum porrecto de vna pipa wadde et cetera

Die prima mensis Julij anno supradicto Alexander frasar de fotino posuit se in voluntate ballivorum
pro perturbacione iniusta et percussione Elene de Kynnore et emendabit eedem et cetera
Item dicta elena in amerciamento de perturbacione iniusta vnius samule dicti alexandri quia
non purgauit se per iuramentum proprium prout deliberatum fuit per assisam
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio quarto die Julij anno et cetera lxxiiijto

quo die Willelmus blindsel senior
primo die vocatus ad intrandum Johannem ruthirfurd pro quo deuenit plegius ad instanciam Will
elmi setoune ad respondendum plegio per dictum Willelmum setoune super eundem Johannem porrec
to pro iniusta detencione xxvj marcarum octo solidorum et decem denariorum a dicto Willelmo
seton' ex eo et per media sua et cetera Non comparuit / quare precipitur sergeando quod capiat
districtum ab eodem Willelmo plegio et cetera Et quod premuniat ipsum ad intrandum dictum Johannem
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus videlicet hodie ad xvnam et cetera

The same day comperit in Jugement Johne of ruthirfurd ayr til henry ruthir
furd quhilum burges of aberdene / and allegit that on tiisday the xxj day
of Juny last bypast immediate before the decesse of the said henry his
eeme the quhilk decessit on sanct Johnis the baptist day videlicet the
xxiiij day of the said moneth of June At the plesance of the said
henry his eeme than liand in gret infirmite on his dede bed
he consentit to the donacione and alienacione of fyve pundis of annuel
rent yerly of his land liand in the schipraw betuix the landis of alexander
blindsel and alexander of mar on the southe part and the land of matho
cowpar on the north part et cetera the quhilk forsuthe donacione and alienacio
ne and consent of the said Johne gefin thareto for that tyme becaus'
of his age and infirmite that he soulde nocht tak it hevy in hart and that she
soulde nocht be reput the caus' of his dede now as than and than
as now the said Johne Reuokis expresly the said donacione and alie
nacione of the said annuel rent gefin to the priour' and convent of the blak
freris of aberdene of the forsaid land / and protestit solempnitly . that it
soulde nocht turne him na his ayris til na preiudice in tyme tocum
til his fee and heritage as he that is narrest and laghfull ayr
til the said henry his eeme this done before the aldirman bailyes
and consel sittand in Jugement day and place before expremit videlicet the
ferd day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxiiij

Item eodem die actio mota per matheum cowpar contra Jacobum de Kyntor prout patet
in actione precedenti submittitur cum consensu parcium ad certos arbitros sub spe concordie
quod si ipsi arbitri determinare sciunt eandem inter hinc et crastinum diem sinautem crastina die
dictus matheus habebit wardam et Judicium plegij sui porrecti in presenti curia et cetera

Item the same day in the actione movit betuix Duncan of byrs and Johne
symson tailyour anent the debate of a pipe of wadde It is deliue
rit be ane assise that xxx s' gefin til Ranald tailyour be Duncan of
byrs and xiij s' of claith salbe allowit to the said Duncan and the
said Johne sal gif to the said Duncan x s' / and the said Duncan sal
deliuer all the wad that he ressauit of Donald litstar til
Johne symson / alsua the said Duncan salhafe al the Insicht with
lede and lomys that ar now in the said Donaldis lithous' the mail of
the said hous' beand pait et cetera

Item it is deliuerit be ane assise that thom of mar sal content til Dauid
blabir as maistir of the schip x s' for fracht of the last Rais' et cetera
and x d' / and anent all othir clamys thai sal tak iiij evinly persons til accord thame

Item it is deliuerit be the assise that mekle Donald sal fynd a pren
tise til patrik cowpar eftir the tenour of the Indentour made betuix tha
me alsua that he sal content him of his costis and scathis that he has
sustenyt and wil sustene in faute of his prentise

Item the same day the warde and Jugement of the borgh strekit be alexander fresal apon
William of Kyntor is continewit be the baillies vnto the morne for vaiknes of court

Andreas luss' et thomas campsy ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione inter se prout compertum fuit per
assisam per quam deliberatum fuit quod lesio eiusdem andree facto per ipsum thomam erat in defensione suo
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio quinto die Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiiio

quo die curia affir
mata gilbertus morison accusatus per ballivos de iniusta perturbacione Johannis Webstar'
et fractione certorum instrumentorum eiusdem posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de dicta calump
nia et adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et cetera

Item dictus gilbertus morison convictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione Andree smyth
et vxoris sue adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis et cetera et emendabit eisdem prout iura volunt

Similiter Dauid spens et Robertus famulus dicti gilberti ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro
perturbacione iniusta predicti andree smyth prout compertum fuit per assisam

Die sexta Julij anno suprascripto quidam hans nauta accusatus per ballivos de perturbacione
et iniusta lesione Johannis rede quj petens auisari / per prelocutorem suum henricum mor
timar confessus fuit huiusmodi perturbacionem et lesionem dicti Johannis . sed asseruit fuisse in
defensione dicti hans naute et cetera vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento

head.add: Ja cummyng burgensis et frater gilde

div.p:
Eodem die gracia prepositi et communis consilij Jacobus cummyng Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi pro v s' in alba bursa sibi concessis
racione paterne libertatis prestito solito iuramento quam bursam cum dictis
v s' prepositus libere iterum propinauit et tribuit dicto Jacobo in fauorem ipsius et
benemeritorum eiusdem et cetera

warda dependens super plegium mathei coupar contra et aduersus Jacobum de Kyntor
Respectuatur per ballivos vsque ad crastinum diem ad habendum finalem decisionem eiusdem

Die octaua mensis Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiijto Ballivi posuerunt in Respectu wardam
et Judicium plegij porrecti per matheum cowpar contra et aduersus Jacobum de Kyntor asserendo
quod deuenit ad causam et clameum suum de vna barella salmonum et xxvii s' ar
genti causa non defensis vsque ad diem lune proximo venturo ad habendum noticiam cuiusdam actionis
parliamenti de processu alicuius summe existentis infra centum solidos et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio xjo die Julij anno
Domini et cetera lxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die perosnaliter comparens coram ballivis in Judicio Jacobum de Kyntor fatebatur
se fuisse et fore fideiussor alexandro trail de vna barella salmonum pro
thoma branche ad satisfaciendum seu satisfieri faciendum eidem alexandro de
dicta barella salmonum prout Jura volunt

Item eodem die Johannes Vaus vnus sergeandorum palam in curia coram preposito et ballivis
confessus fuit se debere alexandro trail vnam barellam salmonum et Viginti
solidos vsualis monete de terminis transactis

Andreas Voket adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta et percussione Johannis
morison prout compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit parti lese et cetera

alexander mar faber convictus per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Johannis tailyour
verbotenus adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento / et ad emendandum parti et cetera

Item eodem die alexander cowtys convictus per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Duncani
straloch vnius sergeandorum suum officium excercendo adiudicatur in amerciamento
Similiter convictus fuit per eandem assisam de Rebellione facta contra prepositum et cetera
et quod punietur pro huiusmodi delictis ad visum consilij

The same day anent the debatis of compt and rekning betuix thom of
mar and Dauid blabre and the streking of a borgh of the samyn be
thom of mar / the Assise has deliuerit that quhat sowmes of compt
and rekning that was vnpait at the last compt betuix thame
made in brugis vnpait to the said Dauy the said Dauy salbring
tomorne in the houre of caus' his articulis in write of the some'
that was vnallowit in flandris he makand gude faith be his
aith that the said articlis was vnallowit to the said thomas that
beand done the said thomas sal content him of his part that was
vnallowit And than the said Dauid incontinent sal mak to the said
thomas full commpt and rekning and payment of the hail fracht

Die xiiijta mensis Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiiito Alexander cowtys accusatus per ballivos de iniusta
percussione Roberti crag conuictus fuit per assisam et ideo adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento et cetera
et dictus robertus quitus de perturbacione dicti alexandri coutis

Item it was deliuerit be the same assise that sen Sandy cowtys has beyn fundin
be thame now all the causar' of the said strublance / and convict before rychtsa
for strublance of the seriand and Rebellioune of the aldirman that in tyme tocum gif
evyr he beis fundyn makand ony sic strublance againnis ane offisar'
and convict laghfully tharapon he salbe or againnis ony vthir nychtbour of this ton'
he salbe bannyst and expellit oute of this burgh as vnsuffisant and vnwor
the for his said demeritis to remayn in the same et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xviiio die Julij anno Domini suprascripto

quo die Willelmus
blindsel secundo die vocatus ad intrandum Johannem ruthirfurd pro quo deuenit plegius ad instan
ciam Willelmi seton prout patet in actione precedenti Non comparuit nec eundem intrauit Et ideo precipitur
sergeando quod capiat districtum et cetera Et ad premuniendum dictum plegium ad intrandum prefatum
Johannem hodie ad quindenam si dies illa iuridica fuerit alioquin proxima die iuri
dica inde sequente

Eodem die Willelmus cummyn scissor adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per confessionem propriam pro iniusta
percussione Johannis turyn emendabit eidem ad visum prepositi et consilij et cetera

Thomas og ex parte vxoris sue adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione iniusta Johannis chapman
et emendabit eidem et cetera

Egidius molendinarius convictus est per assisam de iniusta perturbacione seruitricis Walteri
blindsel et emendabit parti lese prout iura volunt

Angusius ihoneson primo vocatus ad intrandum Willelmum schand pro quo deuenit plegius
ad sectam Johannis vaus vnius sergeandorum ad respondendum plegio super eundem porrecto pro
iniusta amissione seruicij dicti Johannis Vaus Non comparuit / quare precipitur bedello quod ca
piat districtum de dicto plegio et ad premuniendum ipsum ad intrandum dictum Willelmum
die crastina

Die xixa Julij anno et cetera lxxiiijto Willelmus blindsel procurator et nomine procuratorio mariote
lichtoune extendit plegium super Robertum burnat de iniusta detencione vnius
cathene aurie argentee et annuli aurei a dicta muliere et ab eo tanquam suo procuratori
ex eo quod sepe obtulit sibi dictus Willelmus nomine quo supra soluere argentum debitum super
eisdem et cetera Vnde dictus robertus peciit diem legalem ad respondendum et ballivi assignarunt
eidem diem lune ad quindenam proximam futuram

head.add: promisio pro liberacione ville penes solucionem fiendam domino regj

div.p:
The xxiij day of Julij the yer' et cetera lxxiiij the aldirman chargit the belman
to gang throu the toune and to warne and charge all nychtbouris tocum
til the tolbuthe til provide ane way for the outredding of the toune of certa
ne some' of tax quhilk is awand to the king and mon vtirly be pait
or than the toune tobe recognyst and als' anent our soueran lordis lettres
quhilkis war made til the toune of the freing of the custum of salmond
for certane yeris tocum / and now stoppit at the last chekar / and for tosee for
remede tharof quhilk mocht be alwais leist hurting or grevance to the
toune and the pure commounys of the same Makand intimacione to thame that
quhethir thai com or nocht / the aldirman baillies and consel with the personis that
thai mycht get for the tyme wauld procede anent the remede of the causis
before writin . the quhilk day the maist part of the consel and nychtbouris of
this toune comperit / and herd the saidis matiris and causis pronuncit and schavin
to thame be the aldirman / and than with a consent and assent of thaim all avisit
ly thai hafe gravntit and ordanit . that the personis that war chosin be thaim
of before apon the setting of the wateris and outredding of certane chargis
of the toune sulde now rychtsa hafe power to syt and to prouide for the out
redding of the said chargis for the gude of the toune / and to prolonge the
termys of the setting of the wateris for certane yeris next eftir fo
lowand the Ische of the termys of the last assedacione made be thame
of the wateris . eftir as thai it salbe seene maist expendient be thaim
and for to tak tharof that may outred the said chargis sa that the pure
commounys or nychtbouris of the toune be dischargit tharof because
thai meyn thame hevily enuch and our' mekil taxit of before

Die xxvjta mensis Julij anno suprascripto Willelmus blindsel et gilbertus Riburne
coram preposito et ballivis in Judicio personaliter astantes deuenerunt plegij
legales pro quodam gallico alias leso per Willelmum cadiou de indempnitate
dicti Willelmi pro ipso et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et quod comparebit
coram dictis preposito et ballivis responsurus et Juri pariturus pro lesione dicti
Willelmi cadiou die veneris proximo venturo et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxixo die Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxiiijto

quo die curia
affirmata Willelmus quelp accusatus de perturbacione curie posuit se in voluntate
ballivorum pro dicta perturbacione et ideo adiudicatur fuit in amerciamento et cetera

Willelmus cadiou et quidam gallicus ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro lesione videlicet alter alterius prout compertum fuit
per assisam Et emendabunt adinuicem ad visum proborum

Die secunda Augusti anno suprascripto electi fuerint in assisam Johannes Vaus Edmundus
lowson alexander rede thomas de mar Andreas chapman Jacobus craik Ranaldus
tailyour Walterus morison Johannes hil henricus mortimar and Robertus burnat
quj mature auisati deliberarunt quod Dauid Roberti dabit et deliberabit thome
de camera vnam sedulam compoti de bonis cum quibus ipse se intromisit pertinentibus
dicto thome thoma vnde balliui assignarunt dicto Dauid crastinum diem pro deliberacione dicte se
dule compoti et ad respondendum die veneris proximo venturo

Eodem die coram ballivis in Judicio gilbertus de camera deuenit plegius legalis
Dauid howy pro Andrea ramsay super quem dictus Dauid porrexit plegium
de iniusta detencione vnius toge valoris xxiiij s' ad intrandum eundem andream
ad respondendum dicto plegio die lune xvto die mensis instantis si dies illa iuri
dica fuerit Alioquin proxima die iuridica inde sequente

Thir personis vndirwritin ar chosin til ende and decide the actionez movit betuix
William lowson and Johne of hil / and thai tobe sworne til ende thaim'thaim' overwrites 'it' in lighter ink. lely and
treuly be thare knaulage that is tosay Robert of culan Dauy colison
Wil malisson thom prat and Adam of crafurd / And gif thir persons nedis
informacione of ony man . It salbe lesum to thame til tak til thame
quhom that it plesis thame for the better informacione

Die quinta Augusti anno suprascripto Thomas club et vxor eius quilibet eorum in
amerciamento perturbacione iniusta thome trail et vxoris sue prout deliberatum
fuit per assisam et emendabunt ad visum proborum

Quo die appunctuatum est inter Ricardum hil et Jacobum clerk penes clameum
duarum librarum grossorum in hunc modum videlicet quod si dictus Ricardus Reporta
uerit sufficiens documentum in proxima naue veniente de flandria excepta post na
uem Johannis Vaus quod Robertus ovirdale est contentus de ij li' g' ex parte dicti
Ricardi tunc erit quitus de clameo dicti Jacobi Et si deficiat in dicto documento
dictus Ricardus satisfaciet dicto Jacobo de ij li' g' in flandria aut suis deputatis
in proxima naue nauigante in flandriam excepta naue dicti Johannis Vaus videlicet proxima post
ipsam nauem a portu huius burgi cum bonis mercatorum eiusdem

Eodem die Ballivi continuauerunt wardam plegiorum inter thomam de camera et Moricium
bissat vsque ad diem lune ad xvnam proximo futuro ad habendum finalem decisionem eorundem
erga quem diem oneratus est dictus thomas per ballivos ad portandum Alexandrum rede
qui ipsum traxit plegium dicto moricio / et vt ipse moricius asserit quod dictus thomas deuenit eciam
sibi tanquam debitor quod sibi obtulit in suo Juramento coram ballivis in Judicio
Et dictus moricius constituit patricium bissat fratrem suum procuratorem pro eo in huiusmodi causa
cum potestate eligendi alios sibi in consiliarios et coadiutores secundum quod dicto suo procuratori vide
bitur expedire in absencia ipsius constitutis Promittens Ratum et gratum et cetera

Die xija Augusti anno et cetera lxxiiijto georgius browne posuit se in voluntate ballivorum
de iniusta perturbacione Johannis gryn pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento

Johannes goyn convictus per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Johannis glenmalin adiudi
catur in amerciamento Et in partem emende deliberabit dimediam libram cere ad missam
sancti sanguinis

Willelmus lowson et Johannes hil ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem prout
compertum fuit per assisam per quam emenda refertur ad consilium et cetera

Die xixa Augusti anno supradicto Johannes Wormot posuit se in voluntate ballivi de
iniusta perturbacione curie pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento

Eodem die quedam mariota convicta per assisam de perturbacione Willelmi cardny in verbo
adiudicatur in amerciamento

Johannes tailyour inuenit henricum mortimar plegium legalem de indempnitate Willelmi
cardny aliter quam per viam Juris

Adam hervy adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione cuiusdam Elizabeth prout delibera
tum fuit per assisam
Curia ballivorum tenta xxijo die mensis et anni prescriptorum

quo die Dauid gethane
posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de perturbacione Duncanj straloch seriandi in verbo
suum officium excercendo Et similiter dictus Duncanus in voluntate pro perturbacione prefati Dauidis
verbotenus et ideo ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento et emendabunt adinuicem ad visum proborum

The xxvj day of August the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij thir' persons vndirwritin war chosin
be the consel to syt and toknaw apon the taxis in quhais handis ony thing Remanis
vnpait bath of the first tax and of the last / and als' to knaw in quhais handis the
wattir mail restis vnpait And in quhais handis ony common gudis of tymes bygan
restis vnpait / And tomak thare comptis and paymentis that ar vnmade hiddirtill'
videlicet Alexander of chavmer Johne of mar Richard of Kyntor androw scherar alexander menyes
Johne of Knollis Dauid colison alexander blindsel and patrik badenach . the quhilkis
persons or viij vij or vj of thaim togiddir with the aldirman sal ende the said comptis
and rekningis And quhen it cumis til ony of thar' avne compt tax or mail
thai sal remove

The xxvj day of august the yer' of god et cetera lxxiiij In presence of the aldirman and
baillies personaly comperand Thomas of chavmer and Adam of Knollis
oppinly gravntit that thai become borowis til Morice bissat
for Alexander rede for the Soume of twenty and fyve merkis of vsuale
money of scotland aucht til the said morice be the said alexander for
mariage gude promittit til him for his sistir / Of the quhilk some' of
xxv merkis thar' is xij merkis awand of Witsunday last bygane
And anent the Remanent thai gravnt that sex merkis and a half
was appointit tobe pait at martymes next eftir folowand the
date of this write / and the tothir vj merkis and demi tobe pait at Witsun
day immediatly thareftir folowand And the said alexander rede gravntis
